short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches for the selected text on ENS.Vision

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple browser extension for shopping ENS names in the wild.

This lightweight extension allows you to right click to search selected text on vision.io

1. Highlight the word or phrase you want to search.
2. Right click your selection.
3. Select the ENSearch menu.
4. Search the selected text on vision.io
